actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to limit payment of special pay authorized eligible Veterans Administration physicians and dentists under section 4188, title 38, United States Code, and for other purposes.
short_title: Veterans Administration Special Pay Amendments of 1981

summary.text: Veterans' Administration Special Pay Amendments 1981 - Limits the amount of appropriations which may be expended for special pay for physicians and dentists in the Veterans' Administration's Department of Medicine and Surgery. Permits rather than requires the Administrator to provide special pay for such personnel. Establishes a ceiling rather than a mandatory amount for such pay.

titles.title: Veterans Administration Special Pay Amendments of 1981
A bill to limit payment of special pay authorized eligible Veterans Administration physicians and dentists under section 4188, title 38, United States Code, and for other purposes.
